Articles.Content: I was working on my shuttle like spacecraft (which works by the way ) When I noticed all these little guys were bunched in the corner together. They must be having a meeting on how to best utilize the seats coming in 0.20

I find this quite an interesting find, looks like there getting instructions from their boss (the one facing the crowd)

Edited May 10, 2013 by Penguinhero
Their plotting to kidnap jeb, and take the shuttle into orbit themselves, they are tired of all the debris, and waisted work.

They might be trying to figure out why none of them gets to go to space, and the guy in front is lecturing them on "Not dropping out of school and going to a good engineering college" and all that... if Kerbal engineering schools are even comparable to ours

Kerbal engineering schools are probably better than ours. We have to abide by these odd things called "safety guidelines." While kerbals are taught this important lesson: If it blows up the first time, put some more struts, if it blows up again, have Jeb pilot it.
the guy in the middle is telling a Kerbal joke
I think they're trying to find out who inhaled all that Xenon gas that *was* in a probe destined for Duna, which is now destined to sit in a 75x75 km orbit until it orbit decays or it is destroyed.

Nahh... that is the shop steward organising a strike over safety issues. Apparently someone keeps dropping empty SRB tanks on the roof of the VAB.

Edited May 10, 2013 by NeoMorph
All of you are wrong! They are plotting to take over the second KSC!

Nahh... that is the shop steward organising a strike over safety issues. Apparently someone keeps dropping empty SRB tanks on the roof of the VAB.

*snip*

What are they complaining about, I mean, they've been issued with hard hats, what more do they want!

(love your sig NeoMorph!)
They are planning to kill you as their leader, and elect the glorious Jeb to lead them to infinity and beyond!

I find this quite an interesting find, looks like there getting instructions from their boss (the one facing the crowd)

How do you know they're not teasing him. Maybe the one in front is a loser.
That my friends is a union break.
